item.title: Report X-2024091621
item.description:
Report X-2024091621

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-27T09:15:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-16
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: UNLOAD SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKER TO THE DMP AND DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKER. RESPONDER USED THE DECSION TREE TO FIND THE CORRECT RESPONSE SHEET TO FOLLOW. FOLLOWING THE RESPONSE SHEET THE RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE SPILL AND ALL AFFECTED PACKAGES. RESPONDER BROUGHT LEAKER AND AFFECTED PACKAGES BACK TO THE DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.

item.title: Report X-2024091619
item.description:
Report X-2024091619

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-27T09:15:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-16
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2024091619 SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKER TO THE DMP AND DMP DISPACTED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART TO THE RESPONSE. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE GUIDLINES IN THE DECSION TREE TO START THE CLEANUP. RESPONDER CLEANED UP SPILL AND AFFECTED PACKAGES FOLLOWING GUIDLINES IN THE DECSION TREE. RESPONDER BROUGHT THE LEAKER AND AFFECTED PACKAGES BACK TO THE DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL. 2. X-2024091620 SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKER TO THE DMP AND DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL SPILL CART AND PPE. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKER. RESPONDER CONSULTED WITH THE DECSION TREE ON HOW TO PROCEED WITH THE CLEAN UP. RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE SPILL FOLLOWING THE DECSION TREE GUIDLINES. RESPONDER BROUGHT BACK THE LEAKER TO THE DMP AREA FOR PROPER DISPOSAL OF THE LEAKER.
